description.value: This profile constrains the Task resource for use in requesting fulfillment of an SDOHCC ServiceRequest (i.e. referral for service) and subsequently tracking and managing the fulfillment of that referral.

short.value: A request to fulfill an SDOH service request

comment.value: For Tasks used in requesting fulfillment of an SDOHCC ServiceRequest (i.e. referral for service) and subsequently tracking and managing the fulfillment of that referral.

definition.value: Indicates the "level" of actionability associated with the Task.

requirements.value: This element is Must Support. However, it is not mandatory in order to allow a task to be created without an owner so that one of a potential group of performers can elect to "own" the task (e.g., an 'open' request for fulfillment is set and anyone capable of filling the order can claim it.)
